summary: Near the Anise's Cabin (near Riverwood) you have a Jackalope Companion (with the Dialog Box: Follow - Wait - Favor - Trade - Dismiss) and a Chest with 2 books and a Staff to conjure the Jackalopes ... No DLC needed
descriptionHtml:
[i][b]Near the Anise's Cabin (near Riverwood), not very far of my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87326/?] Khajiit's Family House[/url], you have a Jackalope Companion ( with the Dialog Box: Follow - Wait - Favor - Trade - Dismiss) and a Chest with 2 books and a Staff to conjure the Jackalopes ...[/b][/i]

No DLC needed

[color=#00ff00]Optional File: Esp version Française[/color]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/86qkry6.gif[/img]

[color=#ff0000][b]COMPANIONS [/b] [/color]


You can only have one follower at a time: if you want a different one, you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If you have any problem with the dialog box, or if telling the follower to return at home doesn't dismiss him, or if you have lost the active follower, you can try this:

Type “²” or "`" or "~" key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

With Amazing Follower Tweaks , or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) when you launch the game

If problem with the Dialog Box of the followers/ companions (Wait - Follow - Trade - Favor - Dismiss) you can also enter / exit a house or make a fast travel


[color=#ff0000][b]CREDITS [/b] [/color]


[color=#ff0000]Mihail Romanov [/color] for the Jackalope in [url=https://old.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89483/?] Chasing the legendary Wolpertinger- Easter Egg (mihail immersive add-ons- witcher- jackalope) [/url] (Also CD PROJEKT RED for the Witcher and LorSakyamuni)

Free sounds : [url=http://www.universal-soundbank.com/] universal-soundbank[/url] - [url=http://www.sound-fishing.net/bruitages_animaux.html] Sound Fishing [/url] - [url=http://lasonotheque.org/] lasonotheque [/url] - [url=http://soundbible.com/] soundbible [/url] - [url=http://www.freesfx.co.uk] freesfx [/url] - [url=http://www.xeno-canto.org/]xeno-canto[/url]
author: gg77
